robertianburns.cryptarchsarchive

Class GrimoireCardSelectionIconAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • robertianburns.cryptarchsarchive.GrimoireCardSelectionIconAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class GrimoireCardSelectionIconAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    Creates the Grimoire Card icons/grimoire_selection_icon.xml.

    This class creates the Grimoire Card icons through getting the amount of Grimoire Cards, getting the Grimoire Card item position, getting Grimoire Card item ID, getting the image from drawable, and setting them all in getView.

    Since:
    1.0.0

      • getView

        public android.view.View getView(int position,
                                 android.view.View convertView,
                                 android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Creates the Grimoire Card icons.

        Sets the Grimoire Card icon position, image text (the white text), and image from the drawable folder.

        Parameters:
        position - The position of the Grimoire Card icon.
        convertView - The Grimoire Card icon to inflate (the XML layout to be parsed).
        parent - The inherited view group (from the superclass cardSelectionIconAdapter).
        Returns:
        The Grimoire Card icon position and image.
        Since:
        1.0.0
